title: Legendary Whitetails Men's Buck Camp Flannel, Long Sleeve Plaid Button Down Casual Shirt, Corduroy Cuffs
descriptions:
Meet your new go-to flannel: the Legendary Whitetails Men’s Buck Camp Flannel. Built for comfort, styled for everyday wear, and crafted to last, this long-sleeve plaid button-down combines rugged durability with an easygoing, relaxed fit.

Why you’ll love it:
- Comfort that lasts: Made from 100% soft brushed cotton flannel (5.1 oz), it’s cozy without being heavy—perfect on its own or layered.
- Moves with you: A double-pleated back gives you room across the shoulders for easy movement without pulling or tugging.
- Dialed-in details: Corduroy-lined collar and cuffs add a touch of heritage style while enhancing durability where it counts.
- Everyday-ready: Pill-resistant and fade-resistant fabric keeps its sharp look season after season.
- Smart storage: Classic single chest pocket with a handy pencil slot—great for sunglasses or small essentials.
- Relaxed fit: Designed for comfort indoors or out; refer to the size chart for your best fit.
- Zero break-in: Comfortable straight out of the box, with care instructions to help manage shrinkage and maintain shape.

From the job site to the cabin to weekend errands, the Buck Camp Flannel delivers timeless plaid style and dependable comfort you’ll reach for day after day. Dress it up with chinos or throw it over a tee—either way, it’s a classic you’ll keep in rotation.
